apis.description: List the modules in a course

operations.notes: List the modules in a course

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: - "items": Return module items inline if possible. This parameter suggests that Canvas return module items directly in the Module object JSON, to avoid having to make separate API requests for each module when enumerating modules and items. Canvas is free to omit 'items' for any particular module if it deems them too numerous to return inline. Callers must be prepared to use the {api:ContextModuleItemsApiController#index List Module Items API} if items are not returned. - "content_details": Requires include['items']. Returns additional details with module items specific to their associated content items.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: The partial name of the modules (and module items, if include['items'] is specified) to match and return.

parameters.name: student_id
parameters.description: Returns module completion information for the student with this id.

apis.description: Get information about a single module

operations.notes: Get information about a single module

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: - "items": Return module items inline if possible. This parameter suggests that Canvas return module items directly in the Module object JSON, to avoid having to make separate API requests for each module when enumerating modules and items. Canvas is free to omit 'items' for any particular module if it deems them too numerous to return inline. Callers must be prepared to use the {api:ContextModuleItemsApiController#index List Module Items API} if items are not returned. - "content_details": Requires include['items']. Returns additional details with module items specific to their associated content items.

parameters.name: student_id
parameters.description: Returns module completion information for the student with this id.

apis.description: Create and return a new module

operations.notes: Create and return a new module

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: module[name]
parameters.description: The name of the module

parameters.name: module[unlock_at]
parameters.description: The date the module will unlock

parameters.name: module[position]
parameters.description: The position of this module in the course (1-based)

parameters.name: module[require_sequential_progress]
parameters.description: Whether module items must be unlocked in order

parameters.name: module[prerequisite_module_ids]
parameters.description: IDs of Modules that must be completed before this one is unlocked. Prerequisite modules must precede this module (i.e. have a lower position value), otherwise they will be ignored

parameters.name: module[publish_final_grade]
parameters.description: Whether to publish the student's final grade for the course upon completion of this module.

apis.description: Update and return an existing module

operations.notes: Update and return an existing module

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: module[name]
parameters.description: The name of the module

parameters.name: module[unlock_at]
parameters.description: The date the module will unlock

parameters.name: module[position]
parameters.description: The position of the module in the course (1-based)

parameters.name: module[require_sequential_progress]
parameters.description: Whether module items must be unlocked in order

parameters.name: module[prerequisite_module_ids]
parameters.description: IDs of Modules that must be completed before this one is unlocked Prerequisite modules must precede this module (i.e. have a lower position value), otherwise they will be ignored

parameters.name: module[publish_final_grade]
parameters.description: Whether to publish the student's final grade for the course upon completion of this module.

parameters.name: module[published]
parameters.description: Whether the module is published and visible to students

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: id

apis.description: List the items in a module

operations.notes: List the items in a module

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: module_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: If included, will return additional details specific to the content associated with each item. Refer to the {api:Modules:Module%20Item Module Item specification} for more details.

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: The partial title of the items to match and return.

parameters.name: student_id
parameters.description: Returns module completion information for the student with this id.

apis.description: Get information about a single module item

operations.notes: Get information about a single module item

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: module_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: If included, will return additional details specific to the content associated with this item. Refer to the {api:Modules:Module%20Item Module Item specification} for more details.

parameters.name: student_id
parameters.description: Returns module completion information for the student with this id.

apis.description: Create and return a new module item

operations.notes: Create and return a new module item

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: module_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: module_item[title]
parameters.description: The name of the module item and associated content

parameters.name: module_item[type]
parameters.description: The type of content linked to the item

parameters.name: module_item[content_id]
parameters.description: The id of the content to link to the module item. Required, except for 'ExternalUrl', 'Page', and 'SubHeader' types.

parameters.name: module_item[position]
parameters.description: The position of this item in the module (1-based).

parameters.name: module_item[indent]
parameters.description: 0-based indent level; module items may be indented to show a hierarchy

parameters.name: module_item[page_url]
parameters.description: Suffix for the linked wiki page (e.g. 'front-page'). Required for 'Page' type.

parameters.name: module_item[external_url]
parameters.description: External url that the item points to. [Required for 'ExternalUrl' and 'ExternalTool' types.

parameters.name: module_item[new_tab]
parameters.description: Whether the external tool opens in a new tab. Only applies to 'ExternalTool' type.

parameters.name: module_item[completion_requirement][type]
parameters.description: Completion requirement for this module item. "must_view": Applies to all item types "must_contribute": Only applies to "Assignment", "Discussion", and "Page" types "must_submit", "min_score": Only apply to "Assignment" and "Quiz" types Inapplicable types will be ignored

parameters.name: module_item[completion_requirement][min_score]
parameters.description: Minimum score required to complete. Required for completion_requirement type 'min_score'.

apis.description: Update and return an existing module item

operations.notes: Update and return an existing module item

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: module_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: module_item[title]
parameters.description: The name of the module item

parameters.name: module_item[position]
parameters.description: The position of this item in the module (1-based)

parameters.name: module_item[indent]
parameters.description: 0-based indent level; module items may be indented to show a hierarchy

parameters.name: module_item[external_url]
parameters.description: External url that the item points to. Only applies to 'ExternalUrl' type.

parameters.name: module_item[new_tab]
parameters.description: Whether the external tool opens in a new tab. Only applies to 'ExternalTool' type.

parameters.name: module_item[completion_requirement][type]
parameters.description: Completion requirement for this module item. "must_view": Applies to all item types "must_contribute": Only applies to "Assignment", "Discussion", and "Page" types "must_submit", "min_score": Only apply to "Assignment" and "Quiz" types Inapplicable types will be ignored

parameters.name: module_item[completion_requirement][min_score]
parameters.description: Minimum score required to complete, Required for completion_requirement type 'min_score'.

parameters.name: module_item[published]
parameters.description: Whether the module item is published and visible to students.

parameters.name: module_item[module_id]
parameters.description: Move this item to another module by specifying the target module id here. The target module must be in the same course.

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: module_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID

apis.description:
Given an asset in a course, find the ModuleItem it belongs to, and also the previous and next Module Items
in the course sequence.

operations.notes:
Given an asset in a course, find the ModuleItem it belongs to, and also the previous and next Module Items
in the course sequence.

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: asset_type
parameters.description: The type of asset to find module sequence information for. Use the ModuleItem if it is known (e.g., the user navigated from a module item), since this will avoid ambiguity if the asset appears more than once in the module sequence.

parameters.name: asset_id
parameters.description: The id of the asset (or the url in the case of a Page)

id.description: the unique identifier for the module item

module_id.description: the id of the Module this item appears in

position.description: the position of this item in the module (1-based)

title.example: Square Roots: Irrational numbers or boxy vegetables?

indent.description: 0-based indent level; module items may be indented to show a hierarchy

type.description: the type of object referred to one of 'File', 'Page', 'Discussion', 'Assignment', 'Quiz', 'SubHeader', 'ExternalUrl', 'ExternalTool'

content_id.description: the id of the object referred to applies to 'File', 'Discussion', 'Assignment', 'Quiz', 'ExternalTool' types

html_url.description: link to the item in Canvas

url.description: (Optional) link to the Canvas API object, if applicable

page_url.description: (only for 'Page' type) unique locator for the linked wiki page

external_url.description: (only for 'ExternalUrl' and 'ExternalTool' types) external url that the item points to

new_tab.description: (only for 'ExternalTool' type) whether the external tool opens in a new tab

completion_requirement.description: Completion requirement for this module item

content_details.description: (Present only if requested through include[]=content_details) If applicable, returns additional details specific to the associated object

items.description: an array containing one hash for each appearence of the asset in the module sequence (up to 10 total)

modules.description: an array containing each Module referenced above

id.description: the unique identifier for the module

position.description: the position of this module in the course (1-based)

unlock_at.description: (Optional) the date this module will unlock

require_sequential_progress.description: Whether module items must be unlocked in order

prerequisite_module_ids.description: IDs of Modules that must be completed before this one is unlocked

items_count.description: The number of items in the module

items_url.description: The API URL to retrive this module's items

items.description: The contents of this module, as an array of Module Items. (Present only if requested via include[]=items AND the module is not deemed too large by Canvas.)

state.description: The state of this Module for the calling user one of 'locked', 'unlocked', 'started', 'completed' (Optional; present only if the caller is a student or if the optional parameter 'student_id' is included)

completed_at.description: the date the calling user completed the module (Optional; present only if the caller is a student or if the optional parameter 'student_id' is included)

publish_final_grade.description: if the student's final grade for the course should be published to the SIS upon completion of this module

min_score.description: minimum score required to complete (only present when type == 'min_score')

completed.description: whether the calling user has met this requirement (Optional; present only if the caller is a student or if the optional parameter 'student_id' is included)
